blocks.headline: Looking For a Builder.io Alternative?
blocks.text: TinaCMS might be the right fit for your project.

blocks.content:
## Why Choose TinaCMS Over Builder.io?

While both platforms offer visual editing, TinaCMS takes a different approach. Builder has you render all your visual components with a special `<Builder` component, but TinaCMS is designed to work with your existing site structure.

items.headline: Unmatched Local-Development Experience
items.text: TinaCMS supports a seamless local development workflow, allowing changes to schema and content to be merged in a single commit. This greatly enhances the developer experience.

items.headline: Visual Editing Capabilities
items.text: TinaCMS provides an unmatched visual editing experience. See changes in real-time and streamline the content creation process.

items.headline: Ideal for Long-Form Content
items.text: TinaCMS is particularly adept at managing long-form content such as documentation. This makes it a great fit for projects that require comprehensive written content.

items.headline: Git-Based Content Management
items.text: With TinaCMS, content is stored in Git, providing a robust version control system. This aids in creating seamless editorial workflows and is beneficial for both open-source and closed-source projects.

items.headline: Markdown Support
items.text: TinaCMS supports markdown content, simplifying the process of content creation and management. Markdown provides a straightforward and accessible method of creating content.

items.headline: Open Source Frontend
items.text: TinaCMS's frontend is open-source, enabling you to benefit from community-driven improvements and regular updates. It also makes TinaCMS more adaptable to your existing technology stack.

blocks.headline: Discover the power of TinaCMS
blocks.text: Experience a new standard of content management with TinaCMS.

seo.title: TinaCMS vs Builder.io: Why Choose TinaCMS
seo.description: Find out why TinaCMS could be the best choice for your project. Benefit from superior local development, long-form content management, Git integration, and more with TinaCMS.
